topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5483dfe0636872408c5d0000#post_5483dfe0636872408c5d0000

[spoiler] I did when they burnt Merry, you think I won't? I'm bracing myself for that moment.[/spoiler]

Thsi brings a good point. In this particular case, the event was pretty much forshadowed so you kind come to accept it will happen and the character themselves do so. They know the end comes and even if it's sad, you have a better time getting over it.

Now, when a character dies out of the blue, it brings a bigger impact and it's harder to come to terms with that.
